TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GLKTextureLoaderCallback(GLKTextureInfo textureInfo, NSError error);
.class public auto ansi sealed GLKTextureLoaderCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
type GLKTextureLoaderCallback = delegate of GLKTextureInfo * NSError -> unit

Docs.param: The infromation about the texture loaded, or null on error.
On success, this value is null. Otherwise it contains the error information.
Docs.summary: Signature used by the asynchrous texture loading methods in .
